resources.string: You can download the Twistoast Pebble watchapp from the Pebble appstore.
Allows you to automatically refresh the schedules when the app is in the foreground.
Twistoast is an application developed by Baptiste Candellier. © outa[dev] - 2014.\nTwisto is a brand of Keolis Caen.\nouta[dev] disclaims any responsibility in the case of erroneous data.
Go to dev.outadoc.fr for more handy apps!
Visit twisto.mobi, the official website for the Twisto network. (in French)
